name: Duck Game
notes:
Install mono-complete, libcurl3:i386 and ffmpeg (not libav / avconv) via your package manager.

WARNING: The game doesn't run through Lutris and has to be played in Steam. Add a non Steam game to your Steam Library and select DuckGame.sh from your Lutris installation.
content:
files:
- gamefiles: $STEAM:312530:/
- engine: https://github.com/0x0ade/DuckGame-Linux/releases/download/r4/DuckGame-Linux-Complete.zip
game:
  exe: DuckGame.sh
installer:
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: gamefiles
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: engine
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/mod.sh
- execute:
    file: $GAMEDIR/mod.sh
require-binaries: mono, ffmpeg
